title: Measles Vaccination & Awareness Camp
description:
Emergency Response to Measles Outbreak

PHRO organized a medical camp in Bhatti Muhalla (UC Rahooja) after a measles outbreak claimed 4 lives. With DHO support, 150 children were vaccinated and 400 screened. The team debunked myths like 'hanging onions prevents measles' through community sessions.

Key Actions

  • Blood samples collected for diagnosis
  • Vitamin A distributed to affected children
  • LHW teams mobilized for follow-up
"PHRO's swift action saved lives. We need sustained efforts to prevent future outbreaks." — District Health Officer, Sukkur

title: 16 Days of Activism Against GBV
description:
Ending Gender-Based Violence in Sindh

PHRO led a campaign across Sukkur and Ghotki, conducting sessions on women's rights, legal aid, and harmful practices like honor killings. Activities included signature campaigns, puppet shows, and forums with 2,000+ participants.

Highlights

  • Linkages created with Women Protection Cells
  • Open discussions with religious minorities
  • Street theater on early marriage risks
"Now I know how to report violence." — Female participant, UC Long Bhatti

title: Flood Relief Medical Camps
description:
Emergency Healthcare for Flood Victims

PHRO set up 20 mobile clinics serving 25,250 flood-affected individuals in Sukkur and Khairpur. Services included treatment for waterborne diseases, maternal care, and malnutrition screening.

Impact

  • 5 LHWs and 1 vaccinator per camp
  • Ambulance services for critical cases
  • Collaboration with IOM/USAID for winter kits
"These camps were our only healthcare access for months." — Beneficiary, Thari Mirwah

title: Puppet Shows for Child Abuse Awareness
description:
Protecting Children Through Creative Education

PHRO partnered with Sahil Organization to deliver interactive puppet shows in Sukkur schools, teaching children to recognize and report abuse. Key messages included 'Say no to unsafe touches' and 'Never keep secrets about harm.'

Outcomes

  • 1,200+ children educated
  • Teachers trained as first responders
  • UNICEF IEC materials distributed
"My child now tells me everything—thanks to PHRO's puppets!" — Parent, Rohri
